resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105941</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105941</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085926</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Alternative discussion formats: museum exhibit design</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Alternative Diskussion Formate: Museum 
Ausstellungdesign</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Formats alternatifs de discussion : 
conception d'objet exposé de musée</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Formatos alternativos da discussão: projeto
da exibição do museu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formati alternativi di discussione: disegno 
dell'esposizione del museo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εναλλακτικές μορφές συζήτησης: σχέδιο εκθεμάτων
μουσείων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Formatos alternativos de la discusión: 
diseño del objeto expuesto del museo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Designing museum exhibits encourages students to think creatively and to use a wide range of thinking skills.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Museum Ausstellungen konzipierend, regt 
Kursteilnehmer, kreativ zu denken an und eine breite Strecke der 
denkenden Fähigkeiten zu benutzen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Concevant des objets exposés de musée encourage 
des étudiants à penser créativement et à utiliser un éventail de 
qualifications de pensée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Projetando exibições do museu incentiva 
estudantes pensar creativamente e usar uma escala larga de habilidades
pensando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Progettando le esposizioni del museo consiglia 
agli allievi pensare creativamente ed usare una vasta gamma delle 
abilità pensanti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο σχεδιασμός των εκθεμάτων μουσείων ενθαρρύνει τους 
σπουδαστές για να σκεφτεί δημιουργικά και για να χρησιμοποιήσει 
ένα ευρύ φάσμα των δεξιοτήτων σκέψης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Diseñando objetos expuestos del museo anima a 
estudiantes que piensen creativo y utilicen una amplia gama de 
habilidades de pensamiento.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:KATHRYN WALBERT
FN:KATHRYN WALBERT
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085926</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105941</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/alternative-discussion-formats-museum-exhibit-design</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
